venue.name: Rocks Village Bridge to Lowell's Boat Shop

item.description:
The Mighty Merrimack Rowing Race

Sunday May 23, 2010 10:00 am - 4:00 pm

Location: Lowell's Boat Shop - Amesbury, Ma

Phone: 978-834-0050

Entry Fee: Pre-registration - $20 Day of race - $25 Boat

Classes: Dories & Skiffs, Other Traditional Wooden Boats, Kayaks, Canoes, Sliding Seat boats & Shells Course: 5.5 miles downriver with the ebb tide

For more info about Lowell's or the Race go to: http://lowellsboatsho...

Established in 1793, Lowell's is the oldest continually operating boat shop in America and is cited as the birthplace of the legendary fishing dory. The Boat Shop is now a working museum and National Historic Landmark that is dedicated to preserving and perpetuating the art and craft of wooden boat building. Proceeds will benefit waterfront and educational programming. Come support rowing heritage in New England.

group.name: Rowing Gals Community Rowing & Paddling Meetup
